sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { add } from "../store/cartSlice" export const Card = ({ product }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const products = useSelector const { name, price, image } = product return (

{name}

${price}

dispatch(add(product))} className="text-white p-2 rounded font-bold bg-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-900 hover:cursor-pointer" > Add to Cart
) }
